text: is a Japanese idol girl group under Sony Music Artists and T-Palette records. The group was debuted in 2014 to commemorate the 40th anniversary of SMA. They participated in the 2014-2017 Tokyo Idol Festival. Their single "Funny Bunny" reached the 22nd place on the Weekly Oricon Singles Chart. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" ! colspan="5" |T-Palette |- !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Albums Chart. !Ref. !Tracklist |- |March 22, 2016 |アワー・ソングス |44 | | # YOU (orig.
